kuma asa aththe nodanna ganataya...“ara ganige gedarata,ayi malli ee ganiwa adurannadda.man inne ee gedarata issaraha gedarane.”ee shri lankikaya asa atha.“eyawa man aduranawa.ekayi giye.”thawadurath sagawiya nohaki nisa kuma ese kiya atha.“balagena malli,ee ganige minihawa ge athuledima masahayakata issara wela pihiyen anala marala dala thibuna.hethuwa ee ganige naraka hutapatayaklu.eegedara dan holman thiyenawalu.malli balagena parissamin.apith dan ee paththewath noyidawena paththakata maru wennayi inne.”
